headline: Missed the pharma rebound? Gland Pharma, Cipla among 8 stocks that jumped up to 28% since April
intro: Key pharma stocks, including Granules India and Gland Pharma, have shown substantial recovery, with the Nifty Pharma index increasing 13%. This rebound is attributed to improved global trade sentiment and US policy changes favoring generic drug manufacturers.
imagecaption: Missed the pharma rebound? Gland Pharma, Cipla among 8 stocks that jumped up to 27% since April

headline: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June
intro: Despite a 4% gain in benchmark indices in 2025, Indian equity markets remain volatile due to global trade tensions. InCred Equities recommends 21 stocks with an ?Add? rating, highlighting a favorable monsoon and strong GVA growth as key positives for investors.
imagecaption: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June

headline: Adani Ports, Cipla, Trent and 25 other Nifty 50 companies beat Q4 net profit estimates. Do you own any?
intro: March quarter earnings brought relief to the Indian stock market as corporate performance exceeded estimates. Nifty 50 companies showed a 3.7% year-on-year profit increase, with 28 out of 50 stocks outperforming projections, though net profit growth remained in single digits.
imagecaption: Adani Ports, Cipla, Trent, and 25 other Nifty 50 companies beat Q4 net profit estimates

headline: Indian pharma?s young blood takes over as drug dynasties crack the succession code
intro: Several Indian pharmaceutical companies are ushering in the next generation of their promoter families to take over the reins, even as India?s corporate landscape is riddled with high-profile family disputes.
imagecaption: Vidhi Shanghvi heads Sun Pharma's consumer healthcare business.

headline: Don?t expect immediate impact of US tariff threat, price cuts on business, says Cipla head
intro: Cipla?s Q4FY25 revenue rose 9% year-on-year to  ?6,730 crore, while it reported profit after tax of  ?1,222 crore, up 30% from the previous year. The company reported Ebitda of  ?1,538 crore, with a margin of 22.8%.
imagecaption: Cipla?s One India Business grew at a healthy 8% y-o-y during the quarter.

headline: Cipla Q4 Results: Profit jumps 30% YoY; declares dividend of  ?16
intro: Cipla Q4 Results: Cipla reported a 30.12% year-on-year increase in Q4FY25 net profit, reaching  ?1,221.84 crore, up from  ?939.04 crore. Sales revenue rose by 8.5% YoY to  ?6,597.72 crore compared to  ?6,082.37 crore in Q4FY24.
imagecaption: Cipla Q4 Results: Cipla's net profit jumped 30 per cent YoY in Q4F25.
